vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄβυσσος, ον,
bottomless, unfathomed, πηγαί[Refs 5th c.BC+]: generally, unfathomable, boundless, πλοῦτος[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II ἡ ἄ. the great deep, [LXX]: the abyss, underworld, [NT]; the infinite void, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Abyss, the deep place, the underworld, the abode of the dead and demons, "unfathomable depth"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Abyss, the deep place, the underworld, the abode of the dead and demons, "unfathomable depth"
bottomless; place of the dead, Lk. 8:31; Rom. 10:7
vocabInfos._es_Definition: abismo el hogar de los demonios y los espíritus malignos; el mundo de los muertos (ROM.10:7)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 深淵
2) (與死者或魔界相關的)他界, 深淵
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 深渊
2) (与死者或魔界相关的)他界, 深渊
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hố không đáy; vực thẳm / α (G1 không) + βυθός (G1037 biển sâu)
